title: PA-24-04: 2024 Annual Agency Ethics Program Questionnaire
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/68F2F893195E4ACE85258B620050CFC4/$FILE/PA-24-04_2024 Annual Agency Ethics Program Questionnaire.pdf?open
summary: This program advisory provides an advance copy of the Annual Agency Ethics Program Questionnaire, explains how and when agencies must submit their response, describes the changes made from the previous questionnaire, and reminds agencies of the public availability of the questionnaire
